channel.title: [HELP] I need some help (moderate question) [HELP]
channel.description:
[b]Please read the whole thing... and if you know how to do this, please tell me...[/b]
Okay, I want to create a new points system for my minigame, and I was thinking if I could create something like pk points or "hasstarter = 1" or something like that in my moreinfo folder... how would I go by doing this, would I just simply add "minigamepoints = 0" in my more info file then add a code for everytime you complete a stage in the minigame it adds points, or do I have to edit stuff in my client.java?
don't flame saying I'm a stupid noob please...
ps. yes I have checked the tutorial sections for this... very many times

item.title: [HELP] I need some help (moderate question) [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

Please read the whole thing… and if you know how to do this, please tell me…

Okay, I want to create a new points system for my minigame, and I was thinking if I could create something like pk points or “hasstarter = 1” or something like that in my moreinfo folder…
how would I go by doing this, would I just simply add
“minigamepoints = 0” in my more info file then add a code for everytime you complete a stage in the minigame it adds points, or do I have to edit stuff in my client.java?
